header.text: At KV Servicios y Maquinados, we turn your vision into reality. From the initial design phase to the final touches.

aboutHome.title: Improving facilities to your satisfaction
aboutHome.phrase: With more than 10 years of experience in the industrial sector, we are committed to delivering exceptional results that exceed our customers' expectations.
aboutHome.text-1: At KV & Servicios, we believe in diversification as our core principle and strategy. This allows us to offer more competitive costs, better resource utilization, and ultimately, better prices for our clients' contracted services. Our team of experienced workers and technicians is dedicated to providing prompt solutions to industrial needs with great market technology.
aboutHome.text-2: We pride ourselves on our quality, responsiveness, cooperation, professional ethics, and innovation.

contactHome.title: Let's work together to create sustainable and innovative solutions for your projects.
contactHome.text: We are here to help you with your projects needs. Please feel free to contact us for more information or to schedule a consultation.

servicesHome.title: Listen Better. Plan Better. Build Better
servicesHome.headerTxt: Take a look at all the services we offer. We have a wide range of services to help you create an innovative and sustainable project.

service-1.title: Welding and Structural Fabrication
service-1.text: We offer a wide range of welding and structural fabrication services, ranging from aluminum to stainless and carbon steel.

service-2.title: Industrial Maintenance and Repairs
service-2.text: We provide comprehensive industrial maintenance and repair services for a wide range of equipment and systems.

service-3.title: Machining and Special Parts Manufacturing Services
service-3.text: We offer specialized machining and custom part fabrication services to meet the specific needs of our customers in various industrial sectors.

service-4.title: Industrial Installations and Project Management
service-4.text: We offer comprehensive industrial installation and project management services, covering a wide range of systems critical to the efficient operation of plants and factories.

service-5.title: Metal Cutting and Forming Services
service-5.text: Specialized metal cutting and forming services, using state-of-the-art technology to meet the most demanding needs of our customers in various industrial sectors.

service-6.title: Industrial Project Development and Engineering
service-6.text: We offer engineering and development services for industrial projects, taking advantage of our extensive experience and technical knowledge to provide innovative and efficient solutions.

sectorHome.title: Sector we work in
sectorHome.text: We work in a variety of sectors, including commercial, residential, industrial, government and hospitality.

sector-1.title: Industrial
sector-1.text: We offer specialized services for industrial facilities, including preventive and corrective maintenance of equipment, electrical and mechanical installations, refrigeration systems, specialized welding, and more.

sector-2.title: Commercial
sector-2.text: We provide a wide range of commercial services, including installation and maintenance of HVAC systems, structural repairs, and energy efficiency solutions.

sector-3.title: Residential
sector-3.text: Our project management services are designed to assist with home remodeling and improvements, including electrical and plumbing installations.

sector-4.title: Government
sector-4.text: Our team has experience working on government projects, including public building maintenance and infrastructure improvements.

sector-5.title: Hospitality
sector-5.text: We have experience working on hospitality projects, including hotels, restaurants, and other commercial establishments, offering comprehensive maintenance solutions.

latestProjects.title: Construction industry at its finest
latestProjects.text: At KV & Services we propose high quality solutions for all our customers' projects. Our decade of experience and all the projects we have completed support us as a great choice for your projects.
latestProjects.text-2: This are some of our latest projects. We are a team of passionate people whose goal is to improve everyone's life through disruptive products. We build great products to solve your business problems. Our products are designed for small to medium size companies willing to optimize their performance.

footerCTA.text: Let's start your project to be realize

footer.phrase: At KV & Services we are committed to provide the best quality and experience to our customers. We are a safe and reliable option.

contact.address: Cerro de la bufa, Col. Aztlán, Reynosa, Tamps.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.title-2: Any questions you want to ask?
faq.imageText: Send a message and we will contact you as soon as possible.

q1.question: What is the company's mission?
q1.answer: Our mission is to create fast solutions for industrial needs, providing the best quality, responsiveness, cooperation, professional ethics and innovation in the market.

q2.question: What is the company's vision?
q2.answer: Our vision is to consolidate as a leading company in industrial maintenance services through trust, innovation and adaptation to achieve total satisfaction of our customers.

q3.question: What types of services does KV & Services offer?
q3.answer: KV & Services offers a wide range of solutions, including electrical and mechanical installations, preventive maintenance, refrigeration systems, specialized welding, handling of special gases, compressed air systems, machining of parts, fabrication of metal structures and installation of overhead cranes.

q4.question: What experience does KV & Services have in the industry?
q4.answer: KV & Services is backed by the experience of its founders and a group of engineers with more than 10 years of exposure to the maquiladora industry and construction projects.

q5.question: What is KV & Servicios' approach to cost and efficiency?
q5.answer: Our principle and strategy is diversification, which allows us to offer better cost competitiveness due to work volumes, better absorption and utilization of our technical and human resources. This translates into better prices for the services contracted by our clients, always maintaining a focus on efficiency and continuous improvement.

choose.title: Safe solutions and constructions
choose.text: We are a team of professionals dedicated to provide the best service to our customers. Our experience and versatility make us the ideal choice for your industrial projects.

r1.title: More than 10 years of experience
r1.text: Our team has more than a decade of exposure to the maquiladora industry and construction projects.

r2.title: Professional and Expert
r2.text: We have a group of highly trained workers and technical personnel specialized in different areas.

r3.title: Diversification of services
r3.text: We offer a wide range of services, from electrical installations to fabrication of metallic structures.

r4.title: Integral Support
r4.text: We understand the specific needs of the industry and we adapt to keep your operations at an optimal level of productivity.

formContact.title: Keep in touch with us
formContact.description: We are here to help you. If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact us.

ideas.title: Constructing Your Dream House with Passion
ideas.text: We are a team of passionate people whose goal is to improve everyone's life through disruptive products. We build great products to solve your business problems. Our products are designed for small to medium size companies willing to optimize their performance.
ideas.altText: Image of workers working with steel

t1.name: Carlos Méndez
t1.text: The maintenance on our refrigeration system was excellent. KV & Services resolved everything quickly and provided very helpful recommendations. High quality service and total professionalism.

t2.name: Laura González
t2.text: We requested a custom metal structure, and they fabricated and installed it flawlessly. Their commitment to safety and quality is second to none. recommended!

t3.name: Andrés Ramírez
t3.text: KV & Services helped us with the installation of electrical systems, complying with all regulations. Their attention to every detail was impressive. Very satisfied with the service.

t4.name: María Castillo
t4.text: They renovated our machines and compressors without delay and improved our efficiency. A reliable team and committed to the customer. We will definitely hire them again.

t5.name: David Ruiz
t5.text: KV Maquinados is a reliable partner that delivers high quality products on time and on budget. We look forward to working with them on future projects.

services.text: At KV Servicios y Maquinados, we turn your vision into reality. From the initial design phase to the final touches.
services.related-txt: Learn more about our services and everything we offer them
services.contact-txt: Let's start working together and start creating all your works reality.

service-1.title: Welding and Structural Fabrication
service-1.text-1: We offer a wide range of welding and structural fabrication services, ranging from aluminum to stainless steel and carbon steel. Our experience in this field allows us to undertake complex projects such as the fabrication of metal structures, production cells, guards, ladders, doors and gates, racks, racks, steel structures, tanks and roof structures. In addition, we specialize in the fabrication of structural bridges for overhead cranes, which demonstrates our ability to handle large and technically complex projects.
service-1.text-2: We have a welding shop equipped with advanced technology, which allows us to offer high quality and precision services. Our experience in the maquiladora industry and in construction projects provides us with a deep understanding of the specific needs of our customers in various industrial sectors.

includes.item-1: We work with different materials: aluminum, stainless steel and carbon steel.
includes.item-2: We manufacture metallic structures for a variety of industrial applications.
includes.item-3: We specialize in the construction of structural bridges for overhead cranes.
includes.item-4: Our welding shop is equipped with advanced technology to ensure precision and quality.
includes.item-5: We are experienced in large-scale and technically complex projects.
includes.item-6: We have in-depth knowledge of the specific needs of the maquiladora industry.
includes.item-7: We offer the capability to manufacture customized components such as racks, racks and tanks.
includes.item-8: We focus on continuous improvement and competitiveness to maintain high quality standards.

service-2.title: Industrial Maintenance and Repairs
service-2.text-1: In an era where industrial growth is paramount, the efficiency and effectiveness of industrial services play a pivotal role in driving success across various sectors. From manufacturing and construction to logistics and maintenance, industrial services encompass a wide range of activities that help businesses optimize their operations. In this post, we’ll explore the key components of industrial services, their benefits, and why investing in these services is essential for sustainable growth.
service-2.text-2: Industrial services help businesses streamline their operations by identifying inefficiencies and implementing solutions. This can lead to reduced operational costs, increased productivity, and a stronger competitive edge. Many industrial services provide access to specialized knowledge and skills that might not be available in-house. This expertise can lead to improved decision-making and innovative solutions that drive growth.

includes.item-1: We perform preventive and corrective maintenance for a wide range of industrial equipment.
includes.item-2: We offer specialized services for air conditioning and industrial refrigeration systems.
includes.item-3: We provide maintenance and calibration for natural gas and LPG systems.
includes.item-4: We have a rapid response capability for emergency repairs.
includes.item-5: Our technical staff is highly trained in various industrial maintenance disciplines.
includes.item-6: We use specialized tools and equipment for accurate diagnosis and repair.
includes.item-7: We offer long-term maintenance contracts to ensure operational continuity.
includes.item-8: Our services are designed to optimize efficiency and extend the life of industrial equipment.

service-3.title: Machining and Special Parts Manufacturing Services
service-3.text-1: We offer specialized machining and custom part fabrication services to meet the specific needs of our customers in various industrial sectors. Our shop is equipped with high precision machinery, including lathes, milling machines and CNC machines, allowing us to produce complex parts to tight tolerances. We have the capability to work with a wide range of materials, from base metals to special alloys.
service-3.text-2: Our services range from the production of one-off prototypes to mass production of components. In addition, we offer part design and development services, working closely with our customers to optimize the design and functionality of each component. Our team of highly skilled engineers and technicians ensures that each part meets the highest standards of quality and precision.

includes.item-1: We have state-of-the-art machinery, including lathes, milling machines and CNC equipment.
includes.item-2: We offer vertical machining, horizontal machining and turning services for a wide variety of parts.
includes.item-3: We have the ability to work with a variety of materials, adapting to customer specifications.
includes.item-4: We provide design and development services for customized parts.
includes.item-5: We guarantee high precision and compliance to tight tolerances on all our parts.
includes.item-6: We offer rapid prototyping services to accelerate the product development process.
includes.item-7: Our team is experienced in manufacturing parts for specialized industries such as aerospace and automotive.
includes.item-8: We provide reverse engineering services to replicate or improve existing parts.

service-4.title: Industrial Installations and Project Management
service-4.text-1: We offer comprehensive industrial installations and project management services, covering a wide range of critical systems for the efficient operation of plants and factories. Our services include the installation and maintenance of high and low voltage electrical systems, following Mexican and NEC standards. We specialize in the installation of compressed air, water and specialty gas loops, ensuring the efficient distribution of these vital resources in industrial environments.
service-4.text-2: We also install pneumatic, hydraulic and special gas systems such as argon, nitrogen and oxygen, complying with the strictest standards and norms. Our team of highly trained engineers and technicians manage complete projects, from initial planning to commissioning, ensuring that each installation meets our customers' specific requirements and current regulations.

includes.item-1: We perform high and low voltage industrial electrical installations, complying with Mexican and NEC standards.
includes.item-2: We install and maintain compressed air, water and special gas distribution systems.
includes.item-3: We offer installation services for pneumatic and hydraulic systems adapted to the specific needs of each industry.
includes.item-4: We manage complete projects, from design to implementation and commissioning.
includes.item-5: We have experience in the installation of specialty gas systems such as argon, nitrogen and oxygen.
includes.item-6: We provide solutions for channeling and conduction of fumes, vapors and heat through duct systems.
includes.item-7: Our team is trained to perform installations in compliance with the strictest industrial safety standards.
includes.item-8: We offer optimization and improvement services for existing systems to increase energy and operational efficiency.

service-5.title: Metal Cutting and Forming Services
service-5.text-1: We offer specialized metal cutting and forming services, utilizing state-of-the-art technology to meet the most demanding needs of our customers in various industrial sectors. Our shop is equipped with advanced machinery, including a MARK7 pantograph with plasma and oxy-fuel cutting capabilities, a Cincinnati 7 curtain bender with 175 ton capacity, and a CINCINNATI mechanical-pneumatic shear for precise cuts. In addition, we have a 3-roll hydraulic bending machine for sheet metal forming.
service-5.text-2: This combination of equipment allows us to offer a wide range of services, from complex and precise cuts to the bending and rolling of large parts. Our team of highly trained operators guarantees maximum precision and quality in every job, adapting to the most demanding specifications of our customers.

includes.item-1: We use a MARK7 pantograph with 5x10 ft. cutting area, equipped with Hypertherm Powermax125 plasma for high precision cuts.
includes.item-2: We offer oxyfuel services for thicker materials.
includes.item-3: Our Cincinnati 7 curtain bender has a 175-ton capacity and 12-foot length, allowing large parts to be formed.
includes.item-4: The CINCINNATI mechanical-pneumatic shear can cut sheets up to 3/16” x 10 feet.
includes.item-5: We provide rolling services with our hydraulic 3-roll bending machine, with a maximum capacity of 1/2” x 4 ft.
includes.item-6: We have a 120 ton Meister T1-120 hydraulic metal bender for punching, guillotining, angle cutting and notching operations.
includes.item-7: We offer technical advice to optimize the design and manufacture of metal parts.
includes.item-8: Our services range from the production of single prototypes to the mass production of metal components.

service-6.title: Industrial Project Development and Engineering
service-6.text-1: We offer comprehensive engineering and development services for industrial projects, leveraging our extensive experience and technical knowledge to provide innovative and efficient solutions. Our team of highly qualified engineers specializes in the design and planning of industrial facilities, process optimization and continuous improvement of existing systems. We use advanced design tools such as AutoCAD 2012 to create detailed drawings and 3D models, enabling clear visualization of projects prior to implementation.
service-6.text-2: Our services range from initial needs analysis to complete project management, including structural calculations, architectural design and computer aided production planning (CAM). We focus on developing customized solutions that improve operational efficiency, reduce costs and increase productivity for our clients, always considering current regulations and industry best practices.

includes.item-1: We provide design and planning services for industrial facilities using advanced CAD software.
includes.item-2: We offer analysis and optimization of industrial processes to improve efficiency and reduce costs.
includes.item-3: We perform structural calculations and architectural design for industrial projects of various scales.
includes.item-4: We use Computer Aided Manufacturing (CAM) technologies to optimize production processes.
includes.item-5: We manage complete projects, from conceptualization to implementation and start-up.
includes.item-6: We offer reverse engineering services to improve or replicate existing systems and components.
includes.item-7: We provide specialized technical advice on industry standards and best practices.
includes.item-8: We develop customized solutions that adapt to the specific needs and budget of each client.
